t: Create Amazon brand story that portrays your brand theme
s: You want your target audience to understand what your brand is all about and what you can offer them. ... Now that you know who your target audience is and what message you want to convey, it’s time to figure out how best to get that message across. This is where creativity comes in.

t: Sound on commercials is absurdly loud compared to tv shows.
s: My tv and my soundbar have settings ... and loud sounds as well as balancing sound between tv shows and the commercials. But this app is somehow able to override everything. I have to turn my volume up to 77 just to hear the voices on the shows when it’s 55 for everything I watch on any other app or service. This alone would be no biggie but you’ll be sitting there watching the show and when it goes to commercial you jump out of your chair ...
